name: Sayu
desc:
"Mujina Ninja" Sayu

By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.

value.name: Skiving: New and Improved
value.desc:
Sayu: Skiving: New and Improved

"I should have just stayed in bed today."

value.text: Reward for inviting Sayu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Sayu
value.desc: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , and this character begins to <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> : <color=#ffffff>Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick</color> .
If this usage of the skill triggers Swirl, then <color=#ffffff>Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick</color> is converted to DMG of the Swirled Element.
<color=#ece5d8>Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> (or the Swirled Element's DMG)

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 2 HP.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc:
"Mujina Ninja" Sayu

By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I've heard that if you give your brain some exercise, you'll get a good night's sleep afterward, so let's play a round..."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Sayu's deck has a lot of Artifact cards with effects when played, as well as Companion cards that trigger their effects and are discarded when certain conditions are met, unleashing a dazzling offensive through the combined effects of her cards.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc:
"Mujina Ninja" Sayu

By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc:
"Astral Reflection" Mona

Victory or defeat — it has all been written in the stars.

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc:

By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.

customize.name: Skiving: New and Improved
customize.desc:

"I should have just stayed in bed today."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Skiving: New and Improved
customize.desc:
Sayu: Skiving: New and Improved

"I should have just stayed in bed today."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Um... I made a mistake last time! It doesn't count! Now, what ninjutsu can be used for cards... Let me think..."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Sayu" starts with the Talent Card "Skiving: New and Improved" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Sayu: Friendly

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
